# File lib/i18n/backend/flatten.rb, line 88
        def resolve_link(locale, key)
          key, locale = key.to_s, locale.to_sym
          links = self.links[locale]

          if links.key?(key)
            links[key]
          elsif link = find_link(locale, key)
            store_link(locale, key, key.gsub(*link))
          else
            key
          end
        end
